price: Tàbí wọ́n ń gbèrò ète kan ni? Nígbà náà, àwọn tó ṣàì gbàgbọ́, àwọn l’ó máa f’orí kó ète náà.
arabic: أَمۡ يُرِيدُونَ كَيۡدٗاۖ فَٱلَّذِينَ كَفَرُواْ هُمُ ٱلۡمَكِيدُونَ

version.title: Yoruba translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Yoruba by Abu Rahima Mikhail Aikweiny, printed in 1432 H.

meta.transliteration: am yurīdūna kaydan fa-alladhīna kafarū humu al-makīdūna
